verse: यो ब्रह्माणं विदधाति पूर्वं यो वै वेदांश्च प्रहिणोति तस्मै । तह देवंआत्मबुद्धिप्रकाशं मुमुक्षुर्वै शरणमहं प्रपद्ये

terms.आत्मबुद्धिप्रकाशं: light of the self and the intellect

meaning: He who created Brahman (the Absolute Reality) in the beginning, who also sent forth the Vedas (sacred scriptures). To that God who is the light of the self and the intellect, I, who desire liberation, surrender myself.
